channel.title: Making a pk shop [317] Cammy PVP!
channel.description:
Hello, I am wanting to make a pk points shop on my cammy pvp server, it is 317. I have the wanneshop #22 for the pk points. Here is the code that I put in, but it still says "coins" instead of "pk points" for the items in that shop.
if (MyShopID == 22) { sM("You don't have enough PK points."); break; } I need help with the right code! thanks :) Owner owwch

item.title: Making a pk shop [317] Cammy PVP!
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Hello, I am wanting to make a pk points shop on my cammy pvp server, it is 317.
I have the wanneshop #22 for the pk points.
Here is the code that I put in, but it still says “coins” instead of “pk points” for the items in that shop.

if (MyShopID == 22) {
sM(“You don’t have enough PK points.”);
break;
}
I need help with the right code! thanks
Owner owwch

Read full topic
item.source: Making a pk shop [317] Cammy PVP!
